sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a height of 8 cm and a base of 12 cm. What is the area of the parallelogram? (Answer: 96 cm²)
message_2:
To find the area of a parallelogram, we use the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 12 cm and the height is 8 cm. So, we can plug these values into the formula:

Area = 12 cm × 8 cm = 96 cm²

The area of the parallelogram is 96 cm².
